title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 7 Picks and Betting Breakdown with Chad Millman, Fake Q's/Real Answers Defending Urban
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 7 Picks and Betting Breakdown with Chad Millman, Fake Q's/Real Answers Defending Urban
description:
First, in Fake Questions, Real Answers, Colin defends Urban Meyer against a false media narrative (3:00), why Tua's supporters are so angry at Colin (5:00), why he would refuse to represent Ben Simmons (7:00), and what he thinks of Jim Harbaugh's 6-0 start (8:00). Then, The Action Network CCO Chad Millman tells Colin whether his NFL Week 7 picks are "sharp" or "square," including Bengals/Ravens (12:00), Washington/Packers (15:00), Falcons/Dolphins (22:00), Panthers/Giants (25:00), Chiefs/Titans (27:00), Eagles/Raiders (29:00), Colts/49ers (33:00), and they force themselves to make a pick for three games with massive spreads: Bears-Buccaneers, Texans-Cardinals, and Lions-Rams (40:00). Then they discuss the challenges of having kids in college... and the conversation then goes wherever they decide to take it.

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
